nodes.text: Power Station was a location in Mos Eisley on Tatooine where citizens could come to power their speeders, droids or equipment. It was a place where the common people of Mos Eisley came to chat before or after their work. The station was run by the uninterested power droid 4-LB. It charged 15 credits to power a speeder and 3 to 4 credits to power a droid.
